content.rendered:
Hello and welcome to the This Week in Genesis #7, where you inspire me with your awesome new sites, Genesis represents at WordCamp Miami, and StudioPress takes a peek into the mind of Bill Erickson.

Genesis at WordCamp Miami 2015

Genesis was very well represented at WordCamp Miami with talks by both Andrea Rennick and Jesse Petersen. If you couldn’t make it though, you can view videos and slides of their talks online now.

Genesis Framework Introduction by Andrea Rennick

Intermediate to Advanced Genesis by Jesse Petersen

Showcase

Another week, another set of awesome sites from you stellar folks in the Genesis Community, here’s a few of the best.

First up that man Srikat, with a nice PSD to WordPress conversion:

Good to see my PSD > WP using Genesis project go live. https://t.co/p5nah8Reca

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 1, 2015

New site from the talented and lovely folk at Bourn Creative:

New #genesiswp WordPress site live 🙂 This one for Team Delegate (did the logo too) http://t.co/qxJTdnxiIn

— Jennifer Bourn (@jenniferbourn) June 4, 2015

Jackie D’Elia with a great looking site based on Carrie Dils’ Winning Agent theme:

New client site launched today. http://t.co/S43gAPwoAv #genesiswp using a custom #winningagent theme pic.twitter.com/0nzHfedVq5

— Jackie D'Elia (@SavvyJackie) June 4, 2015

Neil Gee launches a great site based on StudioPress’ Café Pro theme:

New Olive Oil site done from Café Pro ~ http://t.co/pgl3KQQoFV #genesiswp

— Neil Gee (@_neilgee) June 5, 2015

And finally, Shaan Nicol launches a new site for Films At The Fort.

Articles

One of my favourite GenesisWP things this week was this short interview with Bill Erickson.

If you don’t know Bill, he’s a long standing WordPress / Genesis developer who has been extremely generous in sharing both his coding practices, his many fantastic plugins and his business model with the rest of the community.

How Bill Erickson Combines Content and the #GenesisWP Framework to Build His Business: http://t.co/DfnUJTW2ri

— StudioPress (@studiopress) June 2, 2015

Plus, at the end of the post something to tease you from Brian Gardner:

Hey, I made a video for you. Sign up at the bottom of this post for instant access —> http://t.co/E6KfENBlko

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) June 3, 2015

Plugins

Mike Hemberger does a soft re-launch of his Styles for Genesis plugin.

Jackie D’Elia is back again with news that she’ll be releasing a new Genesis Agent Profiles Extended plugin:

Coming Soon -> Genesis Agent Profiles EXTENDED plugin. Improved styling, sorting incl random order. #genesiswp #agentpress @winningagent

— Jackie D'Elia (@SavvyJackie) June 2, 2015

Plus, a new Genesis Super Customizer pluginis released by Ray Barnes which promises the ability to “customize colors, create a fixed header that shrinks on scroll, upload logos, edit footer credits, and much more, all through the native WordPress Customizer interface”:

Just Released !! Genesis super customizer http://t.co/mfLxkUWZ1Q #genesis #wordpress #wordpressdesign

— WPAddict (@wpaddictuk) May 30, 2015

Podcasts

UK Genesis is back with a vengeance this week with special guest Sue Fernandes on episode 9 of their fortnightly podcast:

Plus, the peerless Carrie Dils is back and chatting to Kori Ashton this week on episode 61 of OfficeHours.fm:

And that’s it for this week. My thanks as always to all the people that create and share all this great stuff in the first place. There wouldn’t be a weekly round-up without you.

Sadly(?) I’m away for next week’s This Week in Genesis so you’ll have to amuse yourselves (tough breaks I know). In the meantime, I recommended checking out the Daily Bolt and joining the Genesis Slack channel if you’re not already part of the family.

PS If you’re getting into Rainmaker or just thinking of playing around with it, I did an article this week for Hack the Entrepreneur which I modestly branded The Ultimate Guide to Building a (Free) Membership Site with Rainmaker. If you’re using Rainmaker (or thinking of using) would love to hear your thoughts.

excerpt.rendered: Two great talks from Andrea Rennick and Jesse Petersen at WordCamp Miami, Bill Erickson talks to StudioPress, plus more awesome new Genesis websites in the community showcase.
